item.title: Permissions
item.description: User Groups User organize themself by creating projects and groups in Gitlab Namespace Mapping Cluster Authentication LDAP Authentication kubelogin RBAC Service Accounts Capabilities The required capabilities for Conduit (a PSP with CAP_NET_ADM activated) are made availabe via a special service account conduit. Deployments that wish to use the Service Mesh must assign the service account in der deployment description.
